Joe is excited to be performing for the first time at Apple Hill. After a long break from the stage he first dipped his toe again with Theatre Factory as an Assistant Stage Manager, followed up shortly thereafter as “Stage Manager” in It’s a Wonderful Life: A Live Radio Play with Mon River Arts and had a great time as Tim the Stage Manager in Noises Off! for Old Schoolhouse Players in Hickory. Thanks go to Stephen for helping him finally break the Stage Manager streak! Many thanks to the cast and crew for all their hard work and silliness, making every night a blast! Finally, Joe would like to thank his wife, Andrea, for her constant love, support, and tolerance!.
